extendedInfo.description: Your house is the most valuable assets you own, so you need this application to keep it in perfect condition!"House Maintenance Schedule" is a calendar application to log date of routine maintenance done to your home, and to remind you about the due date of the next maintenance. As a reference, it also has an easy-to-follow, month-to-month guide for maintenance works needed by you home. So you will always know when to do, and what to do to keep your house in good shape, avoiding disastrous financial loss when problems show up.Key features include:-Maintenance records and friendly due date reminder.-Logs maintenances that need to be done annually, such as flushing water heater, inspecting fire extinguishers, pumping septic tank, changing oil for mower, checking safety reverse of garage door opener, sweeping Chimney and tuning up HVAC.- Logs maintenances that need to be done every 6 months, such as cleaning lint from clothes dryer, cleaning water inlet filters of washer, changing smoke/CO detector battery, cleaning gutter/downspouts, inspecting roof/siding/exterior caulking, and cleaning range hood and filter. *- Logs maintenances that need to be done every 3 months, such as changing water filter, changing air filter, checking water pump and sump pump. *-A month-by-month guide about what is needed inside/outside of your house and in your garden and yards.The application is developed by cooloy.com. Thanks for your support!* Only available in the Pro version.Keywords: reminder, tips, property management, home project, real estate, home improvement

reviews.title: Very nice app to help maintain your home!
reviews.comment: I\'d give it 5 stars if you could add the ability to create custom inspections that are not currently provided, thanks!
reviews.author: Ryan Iwanowski

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Would be better if you could make your own custom reminders.
reviews.author: Christopher Hart

reviews.title: Missing necessary features
reviews.comment: Unlike the car maintenance app by the same developer this one does not let you add custom jobs. You are stuck with the limited jobs included. Where\'s stuff like AC bleach cleaning or septic tank chlorine check or maintenance?  If the job is not here you cannot add it. That should be a basic features,  especially for a paid app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not ready for prime time
reviews.comment: Missing flexibility and multiple home maintenance items
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: NOT worth $2. It gives a FEW tasks and the ability to input when you last did them. No notifications...nothing. Very amateurish for  a paid app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent! An invaluable tool for home owners.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. I don\'t have to worry about keeping track. Don\'t have to worry about something missed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: House maint. Pro: I love it, I just wish you included notifications to remind me when these things needed done. Possibly tie it in with google or any calendar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incomplete
reviews.comment: Would be nice to be able too modify task or add tasks not included
reviews.author: A Google User
